sub_title: Cycling consultant | Cycling Highways | Velo-city 2017 | Urban planner | RHDHV | Inter-governmental cooperation
summary:
By combing my experience in the field of (cycling) mobility and my training as an urban planner I am able to create effective connections between these fields of expertise. Public space is not just transportation space, just as that traffic and mobility is not just about moving goods and people. The trip in itself, be it on a bicycle, in a car or in a train,  can add value to the traveller ánd to the inhabitant of a city. By allowing people to move in and between place you create connections and facilitate social interaction creating innovation and a sense of belonging to space and place.

In the past years I have been working at several governmental levels; regional, state and the national level. It is my experience that cooperation between organization is based on cooperation between individuals. Facilitating the discussion between professional and allowing an exchange of ideas and knowledge to take place is key to developing succesfull policies. By facilitating these discussions and 'translating' the context of ideas to the fields of other expertises, innovation and policy development can take place. I see it as a privilige to work in this field and facilitate these discussions in order to create more liveable, happy and sustainable cities.

awards.title: Best civil servant servant of 2014
awards.description:
The magazine 'Public Mission' organized an election for the best civil servant in the Netherlands. I was nominated by a colleague for this title along with 99 other civil servants from across the country. The first round was an election. After the election, the final ten candidates were judged by an independent jury. Unanimously, the jury voted me as the best civil servant of 2014.
For the press release (in English): http://arnhemnijmegencycling.com/news/current/best-civil-servant-of-the-year-works-at-arnhem-nijmegen-city-region/
For more information (in Dutch): http://www.pm.nl/top100-2014

projects.title: Inspiratieboek snelle fietsroutes, CROW (incl. Fietsberaad)
projects.description: Vanaf 2005 zijn in Nederland vijfentwintig snelle fietsroutes gerealiseerd of in voorbereiding. Bij de realisatie van deze regionale “snelle” fietsroutes gaat het zowel om de aanleg van compleet nieuwe infrastructuur als om het verbeteren van bestaande fietsroutes. Bij de aanleg van deze snelfietsroutes werd duidelijk dat er meer nodig is dan alleen het toepassen van de maximale kwaliteitsrichtlijnen uit de CROW 'Ontwerpwijzer fietsverkeer' (publicatie 230). Voor het ontwerp, het proces en de communicatie zijn de afgelopen jaren lessen geleerd. Deze vormen een goede basis voor het formuleren van een 'inspiratieboek snelle fietsroutes'.

contributors.headline: Cycling consultant | Cycling Highways | Velo-city 2017 | Urban planner | RHDHV | Inter-governmental cooperation
Senior beleidsmedewerker fiets (strategie) bij Provincie Utrecht

Fietscoördinator at Gemeente Rotterdam - Stadsontwikkeling                   
Daarnaast soms kleine klus via Tibs Advies

projects.title: Snelfietsroutes Arnhem-Nijmegen
projects.description:
Snelfietsroutes verbinden woon-, werk- en winkellocaties met elkaar. Het zijn snelle, directe, comfortabele en veilige routes, waarbij fietsers zoveel mogelijk voorrang krijgen. Door routes aan te leggen die prettig zijn, zonder veel moeite te befietsen zijn en een logische (herkenbare) route vormen willen het fietsen voor de mensen in de regio aantrekkelijker maken.  Herkenbaarheid van de  routes kan bestaan uit rood asfalt, bijzondere bewegwijzering, aangepaste lichtmasten, al dan niet ondersteund door een app met route-informatie. De snelfietsroutes zorgen voor een betere bereikbaarheid van de regio en voor een gezondere omgeving.

Onderstaande routes zijn nu in aanleg of voorbereiding:
- RijnWaalpad, de snelfietsroute tussen Arnhem en Nijmegen 
- Snelfietsroute Nijmegen-Beuningen
- Snelfietsroute De Liemers (Arnhem - Zevenaar)
- Snelfietsroute Cuik - Mook - Nijmegen
- Snelfietsroute F12 (Arnhem/Velp - Zevenaar)
- Snelfietsroute Arnhem - Wageningen

contributors.headline: Cycling consultant | Cycling Highways | Velo-city 2017 | Urban planner | RHDHV | Inter-governmental cooperation
Project- en procesleider fietsstimulering 🚲| Directie XTNT

projects.title: Fast cycling route RijnWaalpad
projects.description:
RijnWaalpad is a high quality fast cycling route in planning / under construction between the cities of Arnhem and Nijmegen. With a total length of 17km and investments of € 17mln it is one of the biggest and most ambitious fast cycling routes in the Netherlands.
The planning of the project started in late 2008, with the first parts of the project being built in 2009. Currently (Dec 2013) the last phases of the project are under construction.
As a project manager I am responsible for the whole project, finances and the coordination and cooperation between the 4 municipalities, the province of Gelderland and the Dutch Cyclists Union.

profile_positions.description:
In order to accommodate question from within the Netherlands and from outside the Netherlands I decided to start my own company. In doing so I'm able to participate in Workshops, lecture and (inter)national policy development, aiming at creating healthier, more liveable and human-sized cities. 

As a Dutch urban planner and an expert on active transportation and inter-governmental policy development and implementation, I can contribute to global questions on liveability, health and active transportation, cycling in special.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Fietsberaad is the Dutch knowledge center for cycling policies. The objective of Fietsberaad is the development, dissemination and exchange of practical knowledge for cycling policies in the Netherlands. Starting point is the knowledge needs of employees, directors and representatives of local authorities. 
The Program board has their meetings approximately four times a year and decides on the main projects of Fietsberaad to be implemented. Preparation and implementation work is delegated to the coordinator of Fietsberaad. The Program board consists largely of practitioners in cycling (road) policy employed by municipalities, regions, provinces and water boards and the consulting world. Membership is a personal capacity and not based on other positions.
profile_positions.title: Member program board Fietsberaad

profile_positions.description:
As a person living in the condominium I feel responsible for maintaining the building and keeping the condominium in a good shape. In the last few years my fellow board members and I have been working to get the administration and legal issues 'back on track' after almost 20 years of neglect.
My main task is to supervise the bigger maintenance projects, and trying to keep those projects within budget and planning.
profile_positions.title: Board member

profile_positions.description:
At the province of Gelderland (Provincie Gelderland) I work as a project leader / program manager. It is, more or less, a continuation of my previous work at the Arnhem Nijmegen City Region: working on developing cycling policies, fast cycling routes and (inter)national cooperation on cycling and cycling policies.
For the next two years we are aiming at connecting the cycling, mobility-oriented, goals with health, sustainability and climate goals, to develop a comprehensive vision and plans for cycling in the province of Gelderland.
profile_positions.title: Project leader / program manager

profile_positions.description: Developing the program for the world's leading cycling conference with over 200 speakers from 40 countries. Velo-city takes place from 13-16 June 2017 in Arnhem and Nijmegen.
profile_positions.title: Program director

profile_positions.description:
For two days a week I was seconded to the ministry of Infrastructure and Environment (Infrastructuur en milieu) on two specific issues:
- Cycling
- Implementation of lessons learned of the national program 'Beter Benutten'. 

Using my experience gained working at the local and national level I was able to contribute to a better understanding of inter-governmental cooperation and effective implementation of (national) policies. Due to upcoming work for Velo-city 2017 I had to terminate my work at the ministry.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader / Policy officer
Advisor on mobility and traffic

profile_positions.description:
Co-founder of JONAS.
JONAS is a network of Young Professionals in the Arnhem Nijmegen Region. Together with four people working for municipalities in the Arnhem Nijmegen Region we founded JONAS. When the start-up phase was finished I handed over my tasks to my successor.
profile_positions.title: Board Member, Treasurer
